n: Red Cabbage With Apricots And Balsamic Vinegar
des: "Here is a sweet and tart addition to your menu.  Can be prepared 1 day ahead, and warmed just before serving. Originally submitted to ThanksgivingRecipe.com."
ins: Melt butter or margarine in a heavy large pot over medium-high heat.  Add onion, allspice, and nutmeg; toss for 1 minute.  Add cabbage and apricots.  Saute until well coated, about 2 minutes. Add apricot preserves and vinegar.  Toss until juices are reduced to glaze and cabbage is crisp-tender, about 6 minutes.  Season with salt and pepper.  Store, covered, in the refrigerator if making ahead.
